tooltip.inscribedbyancients.archeologist: A Journal that keeps tracks of all that you've learned about an Ancient Civilization.
Right-click on an Inscribed Block to write down its phrase, Right-click while holding an Artifact with this book in your Off-Hand to write down its phrase.
menu.translation.title: Translation
item.inscribedbyancients.writable_book.d: I've found some peculiar writings in an ancient ruin, I think I can learn more about these if I find enough writings to compare them...
item.inscribedbyancients.writable_book.h: I've collected enough writings for the moment, I should study what I've gathered now.
tooltip.inscribedbyancients.damaged_tabl: A common enough dig found in ancient ruins, most people salvage them for the components found inside, but maybe there is another way to utilize this artifact...
tooltip.inscribedbyancients.ancient_data: A refurbished tablet from the ancient civilization. It may hold all the answers pertaining to these people, but only to those that can read their language...
tooltip.inscribedbyancients.architects_s: An ancient device able to inscribe the surface a block in ether.  Capable of placing false inscription tiles on surfaces. §gSHIFT§r
tooltip.inscribedbyancients.dead_drive.d: An old device that was found inside a Damaged Tablet, can be salvaged for some basic magic materials... but maybe it can be repaired...
tooltip.inscribedbyancients.experience_d: An esoteric slate that can store a large quantity of magic.  Right-click to store all EXP up to Level 30; Shift Right-click to retrieve all EXP on the Drive.
tooltip.inscribedbyancients.weeping_blac: An obsidian cube that is way too heavy for its size, however its contents still don't match its weight.  Can be broken to obtain otherworldly items.
tooltip.inscribedbyancients.nether_anthr: An otherworldly coal that is warm to the touch.
tooltip.inscribedbyancients.artifactitem: An extremely old, rusted piece of metal that's been twisted and bent by the ages.
A curious device thought to be a sort of Spyglass.  Its lens has long since been shattered.
An eerie, archaic carving made of wood debased by time itself;  What it once depicted is far beyond anyone's guess.
tooltip.inscribedbyancients.ancient_allo: A repurposed mass of an ancient metal who's manufacturing process has been long lost and forgotten.
tooltip.inscribedbyancients.ether_bank.d: A viridescent crystal with a buzzing aura about it.  It's known to be used in a myriad of ancient devices, presumably as a power source.
block.message.inscribed_tile.hint: I could study this further if I had something to write with...
tooltip.inscribedbyancients.dreck_tallow: A highly toxic nut from the Dreck Tallow tree, has a myriad of purposes.
advancements.inscribedbyancients.root.de: This land is old, explore in the right places and you might unearth something groundbreaking!
advancement.inscribedbyancients.write_th: Use a Book & Quill to write down 5 ancient inscriptions to obtain the Archeologists' Journal
advancement.inscribedbyancients.the_late: Repaired a Damaged Tablet and obtained the Ancients' Scribelog!
advancement.inscribedbyancients.reuse_re: Obtained Ancient Alloy by DESTROYING-- *ahem* 'recycling' a precious Artifact!
